description: Detects findstring commands that include the keyword lsass, which indicates recon actviity for the LSASS process PID
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: LSASS Process Reconnaissance Via Findstr.EXE
query: (((((process.executable.text:"*\\findstr.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"FINDSTR.EXE")) AND process.command_line.text:"*lsass*")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*\ \/i\ \"lsass*" OR "*\ \/i\ lsass.exe*" OR "*findstr\ \"lsass*" OR "*findstr\ lsass*" OR "*findstr.exe\ \"lsass*" OR "*findstr.exe\ lsass*")))
